TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NetworkCredential extends System.Object implements class System.Net.ICredentials, class System.Net.ICredentialsByHost
Public Class NetworkCredential Implements ICredentials, ICredentialsByHost
public ref class NetworkCredential : System::Net::ICredentials, System::Net::ICredentialsByHost
type NetworkCredential = class interface ICredentials interface ICredentialsByHost

summary.span: 为基于密码的身份验证方案（如基本、摘要式、NTLM 和 Kerberos 身份验证）提供凭据。

span.span: Provides credentials for password-based authentication schemes such as basic, digest, NTLM, and Kerberos authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个基类，它提供基于密码的身份验证方案（如基本、摘要式、NTLM 和 Kerberos）的凭据。The class is a base class that supplies credentials in password-based authentication schemes such as basic, digest, NTLM, and Kerberos. 实现 接口的类（如 类）返回 对象。Classes that implement the interface, such as the class, return objects. 此类不支持基于公钥的身份验证方法，例如安全套接字层（SSL）客户端身份验证。This class does not support public key-based authentication methods such as Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) client authentication. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 对象与 中的一组统一资源标识符（Uri）相关联。The following code example associates a object with a set of Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) in a . 然后，它将 传递到 对象，该对象使用该对象对 Internet 服务器的请求进行身份验证。It then passes the to a object, which uses it to authenticate requests to an Internet server. [!code-cpp[Classic NetworkCredential Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic NetworkCredential Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic NetworkCredential Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic NetworkCredential Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic NetworkCredential Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic NetworkCredential Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置验证凭据的域名或计算机名。

span.span: Gets or sets the domain or computer name that verifies the credentials.
The name of the domain associated with the credentials.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定用户名所属的域或领域。The property specifies the domain or realm to which the user name belongs. 通常，这是运行应用程序的主机名，或者是当前已登录用户的用户域。Typically, this is the host computer name where the application runs or the user domain for the currently logged in user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性设置与凭据关联的域。The following code example uses the property to set the domain associated with the credentials. [!code-cpp[NetworkCredential_UserName_Password_Domain#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkCredential_UserName_Password_Domain/CPP/networkcredential_username_password_domain.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NetworkCredential_UserName_Password_Domain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkCredential_UserName_Password_Domain/CS/networkcredential_username_password_domain.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NetworkCredential_UserName_Password_Domain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NetworkCredential_UserName_Password_Domain/VB/networkcredential_username_password_domain.vb#1)]
